# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_GAME_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_game STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_game
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/game
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_game
        LINK_PUBLIC
        EnTT
        libmb
        minecpp_api_proto
        minecpp_api_nbt
        minecpp_chat
        minecpp_math
        minecpp_utils
        minecpp_signal
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_nbt
        minecpp_random
        spdlog
)

add_subdirectory("test")
